core.​ XPS_typ_MissionCodeStack

TypeDefinition

Authors

Crashdome

Description

HashmapObject which aides in handling a Stack Trace. Also adds a Mission Event Handler for "ScriptError" to automatically flush and log the current stack.

Parent

none

Implements

Nothing

Flags

Sealed NoCopy

Protected
getStackTrace
call ["getStackTrace"]

Because this object is a Static (read-only) HashmapObject, it can't hold references to other objects without making them read-only also. This method therefore is generated at instantiation to return the stack from it's stored location. See also : initStackLocation

Returns
HashmapObject

of type XPS_typ_Stack

initStackLocation
call ["initStackLocation"]

Generates a random unique ID to store the XPS_typ_Stack HashmapObject at runtime and also generates the code block for getStackTrace to retrieve the XPS_typ_Stack HashmapObject.

Returns

<Nothing>

Methods
#create
createhashmapobject [XPS_typ_MissionCodeStack]
Parameters

none

Returns

<Nothing>

AddToStackTrace
call ["AddToStackTrace",_value]
Parameters
_value

<Anything> - that can be converted to a String by the str command

Returns

<Nothing>

Flush
call ["Flush"]

Flushes the stack and logs the values to RPT file if logging is enabled

Parameters

none

Returns

<Nothing>
